summary: This is a U.S. Marshals Service prisoner schedule report for Jeffrey Epstein, detailing his scheduled production from the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) New York on July 18, 2019. It lists his personal details, the reason for transport (court appearance), and the presiding judge.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The subject of the prisoner schedule report, being transported from MCC New York for a court appearance.

persons.name: Berman, R
persons.context: Listed as the presiding judge for the case related to Epstein's scheduled court appearance.

connections.description: Epstein is a defendant in a case presided over by Judge Berman, as indicated in the prisoner schedule.

events.title: Epstein's Scheduled Court Production
events.description: Jeffrey Epstein was scheduled to be produced from MCC New York to court, as per the USMS prisoner schedule report prepared the day prior.

keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein was in custody at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) New York as of July 17-18, 2019.
He was scheduled for a court production on July 18, 2019, indicating ongoing legal proceedings.
The document lists his offense as 'Sex Offense'.
The presiding judge for his case is listed as 'BERMAN.R'.
The document is a routine USMS administrative form for prisoner movement.
